mapper.select: SELECT F_YQMC ,F_ALL_AREA,F_PERSON_NUMS,F_BUILD_TIME,F_NODE_CODE FROM bes_park WHERE F_YQBH = #{parkId}
select * from bes_energy_type
select F_FHBH , F_PERSON_NUMS, F_AREA from bes_household_conf where F_YQBH = #{parkid}

select a.*,b.F_OPERATOR from bes_ammeter a left join bes_branch_ammeter_rlgl b on a.F_SYS_NAME = b.F_DBSYS_NAME WHERE a.F_SYS_NAME in ( select b.f_dbsys_name from bes_branch_ammeter_rlgl b where b.f_zlbh = #{F_ZLBH}) and b.F_ZLBH = #{F_ZLBH}
SELECT DISTINCT F_NYBH AS id FROM bes_park_energytype_rlgl WHERE F_YQBH = #{parkId}

SELECT ifnull(sum(c.F_DATA), 0) AS fData FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT a.F_ZLBH, a.F_DATA, a.F_CJSJ, a.F_TYPE FROM bes_branch_data a, bes_branch_conf b WHERE a.F_ZLBH = b.F_ZLBH AND b.F_YQBH = #{parkId} AND b.F_NYBH = #{energyid} AND a.F_CJSJ = #{time} AND a.F_TYPE = #{type} AND LENGTH(b.F_ZLBH) = 4) c

SELECT SUM(d.F_DATA) AS fData FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT b.F_ZLBH, b.F_DATA, b.F_CJSJ, b.F_TYPE FROM bes_subitem_branch_rlgl a, bes_branch_data b WHERE a.F_ZLBH = b.F_ZLBH and b.F_TYPE = #{type} and b.F_CJSJ = #{time} and a.F_FXBH = #{fFxbh}) d
SELECT * FROM bes_household_conf WHERE F_PFHBH = #{parkId} order by F_FHBH

SELECT SUM(c.F_DATA) AS F_DATA FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT b.F_ZLBH, b.F_DATA, b.F_CJSJ, b.F_TYPE FROM bes_household_branch_rlgl a, bes_branch_data b WHERE a.F_ZLBH = b.F_ZLBH AND b.F_TYPE = #{type} and a.F_FHBH = #{id} and b.F_CJSJ = #{time} ) c
select a.* from bes_branch_conf a, bes_household_branch_rlgl b where a.F_ZLBH=b.F_ZLBH and b.F_FHBH = #{id}

SELECT DISTINCT d.F_FXBH AS F_FXBH, c.F_DATA AS F_DATA, c.F_ZLBH, c.F_CJSJ, c.F_TYPE FROM bes_branch_conf a, bes_subitem_conf b, bes_branch_data c, bes_subitem_conf d WHERE a.F_EQUIPMENT_SET = b.F_FXBH and d.F_FXBH = b.F_PFXBH AND a.F_ZLBH = #{id} and c.F_ZLBH = #{id} and c.F_TYPE = #{type} and c.F_CJSJ = #{time}
select F_CJSJ from bes_last_data limit 1

SELECT a.F_DBSYS_NAME AS meteruuid, a.F_DATA * b.F_PERCENTAGE AS data FROM bes_realtime_data a, bes_ammeter b WHERE a.F_TYPE = '1' AND b.F_SYS_NAME = a.F_DBSYS_NAME AND a.F_DBSYS_NAME IN ( SELECT DISTINCT F_DBSYS_NAME FROM bes_branch_ammeter_rlgl WHERE F_ZLBH IN ( SELECT DISTINCT F_ZLBH FROM bes_branch_conf WHERE F_NYBH = #{energyid} and F_YQBH = #{parkid} ))

SELECT a.F_DBSYS_NAME AS meteruuid, a.F_DATA * b.F_PERCENTAGE AS data FROM bes_last_data a, bes_ammeter b WHERE a.F_DBSYS_NAME IN ( SELECT DISTINCT F_DBSYS_NAME FROM bes_branch_ammeter_rlgl WHERE F_ZLBH IN ( SELECT DISTINCT F_ZLBH FROM bes_branch_conf WHERE F_NYBH = #{energyid} AND F_YQBH = #{parkid} )) AND b.F_SYS_NAME=a.F_DBSYS_NAME
